response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high-quality features and unique benefits, I believe it would significantly enhance your daily operations or personal life. For this exceptional offering, I propose a price of $15,000. This amount reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also the potential long-term benefits it could bring to you. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success and satisfaction. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 15000}
